summary: This is an email from Gail Goodman to an unspecified recipient at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding her proposed expert witness fees and availability for a case, likely related to the Epstein matter. The email is marked as subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Gail Goodman
persons.context: She is responding to a request from the US Attorney's Office, offering her services as an expert witness for $500 per hour and proposing a meeting time.

events.title: Goodman's Expert Fee Proposal
events.description: Gail Goodman sends an email to the US Attorney's Office (USANYS) stating her hourly rate of $500 for work on a case and proposing a meeting time for the following evening.

locations: University of California (likely UC Davis based on her affiliation with the Center for Public Policy Research)
keyFacts: Gail Goodman, a Distinguished Professor at UC, offered to serve as an expert witness for $500 per hour.
The communication is with the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The document is explicitly marked as subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs.
The email is external and indicates ongoing legal proceedings requiring expert testimony.
Goodman's affiliation is with the Center for Public Policy Research in the Department of Psychology.
